name: Write Something!
description: A writing app that aims to be modern, flexible, and feature-rich.

scripts.pack:win: electron-packager . 'Write Something!' --ignore=release-builds --ignore=build_assets --overwrite --version-string.LegalCopyright='Created by Justin harrelson' --platform=win32 --arch=x64,ia32 --icon=build_assets/icons/write.ico --prune=true --out=release-builds --version-string.CompanyName='Justin Harrelson' --version-string.FileDescription=CE --version-string.ProductName='Write Something!'
scripts.pack:mac: electron-packager . 'Write Something!' --ignore=release-builds --ignore=build_assets --overwrite --version-string.LegalCopyright='Created by Justin harrelson' --platform=darwin --arch=x64.arm64 --icon=build_assets/icons/write.icns --prune=true --out=release-builds --version-string.CompanyName='Justin Harrelson' --version-string.FileDescription=CE --version-string.ProductName='Write Something!'
scripts.pack:linux: electron-packager . 'Write Something!' --ignore=release-builds --ignore=build_assets --overwrite --version-string.LegalCopyright='Created by Justin harrelson' --platform=linux --arch=ia32,x64,armv7l,arm64 --icon=build_assets/icons/write_logo_1024.png --prune=true --out=release-builds --version-string.CompanyName='Justin Harrelson' --version-string.FileDescription=CE --version-string.ProductName='Write Something!'
scripts.build: npm run pack:win && npm run pack:linux

author: Justin Harrelson
